TopicTitle: How nice do you think these devs are going to be?

Articles.Content: The original KSP team was pretty good but Nate and his crew are actually corporate and have bosses who want a game to be made.
Hopefully neither.  They don't seem like the second option, and I wouldn't want a developer team that changes things on a whim.

At this point, they shouldn't be listening to the community about what should and shouldn't be in the game. After the game is released, they should be listening to community about bugs and things that could enhance the game.
They are corporate, but also passionate.

They will be the unlisted 3rd option: Neither.

And probably both the players and their bosses will be unhappy with them but that's the way it goes.

I’m just a pessimist, and I do honestly think they won’t care UNTIL KSP2 is released. Then, they (hopefully) will listen to criticism for updates, and will hopefully be as high spirited as the guy who invented Eeloo was.
